title: Open Learning Theme Kit
subtitle: McGraw Hill UI component library with implementation examples.
detail: Visual Style Guide / UI Component Library that bridged the gap between UX and developer teams at McGraw Hill. A GitHub Pages-hosted demo page consumed SCSS styles and SVG assets from their respective npm packages.

media.embed: <iframe src='https://player.vimeo.com/video/340378847' width='100%' height='539' frameborder='0' allow='autoplay; fullscreen' allowfullscreen></iframe>

title: Vue.js / Node Twitter Demo
subtitle: Twitter demo using Firebase Hosting + Cloud Functions.
detail: Technical demo incorporationg the twitter API and a Vue.js frontend. Do keep in mind - __Machete Don't Tweet__!

title: Envue Platform
subtitle: SEO-focused hosting platform for small businesses.
tech: Jekyll, SnipCart, Google Cloud, Search Console
detail: During our time at Low Tide Digital, we productized the most common services that small businesses need in order to quickly test their service or product. The result was an automated hosting platform that made use of a set of Jekyll website templates along with Google Search Console + Data Studio (for SEO reporting), Calendar, and Payment integration. Google Cloud + GitHub for automated deployments.

title: Find Some Coffee
subtitle: Find artisanal coffee nearby, see curated photos and reviews of Los Angeles coffee shops. Mobile app for [Android](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.apps.fndsmcoffee) and [iOS](https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/find-some-coffee/id1316428363?mt=8).
detail: Website, mobile app and blog. Follow the **Coffee Nearby** menu option to see the Vue.js web app in its full glory.

title: Architecture Study Guide
subtitle: Color-coordinated flashcards representing architectural objects from various historic periods.
detail: Study guide used for a historical survey of global architecture class at USC. Check out the screencap in the [Vimeo app](https://vimeo.com/160999718) or watch it below.

media.embed: <iframe src='https://player.vimeo.com/video/160999718' width='100%' height='700'  frameborder='0' allow='autoplay; fullscreen' allowfullscreen></iframe>

title: FIFA Gate Soccer Scandal
subtitle: Visualization showcasing global corruption schemes via money flows between FIFA officials and conspirators.
detail: This force graph visualization outlines 12 different schemes, as laid out by the FBI in 2015. The **Icons** represent each _Actor_ involved, **Colors** denote _Connection_ types, and **Line Type** defines actual vs planned _Payoffs_. Featured on USA Today's [Fields of Green](http://thefieldsofgreen.com/2015/06/19/fifa-infographic/). Collaborative project with [Rook Campbell, PhD](https://uscpublicdiplomacy.org/users/rook_campbell) - USC Center on Public Diplomacy.

media.embed: <iframe src='http://mihaipeteu.com/media/projects/visualization-fifagate' width='100%' height='700' frameborder='0' allowfullscreen webkitallowfullscreen mozallowfullscreen oallowfullscreen msallowfullscreen></iframe>

title: Middle of June
subtitle: A Los Angeles live music event aggregator with which searches for detailed artist info and associated video clips.
detail: A nodeschool LA side project served as motivation to working with Promise chains. When a live show is clicked on, the artist name is used to query AllMusic for their bio, then query YouTube API for any their videos.

title: Waterbowl
subtitle: A social network for dog lovers (iOS mobile app).
detail: A first foray into mobile development. Users were able to create a profile for their pet and _tag_ various dog parks around town, and communicate with other dog owners. Actual in-app screens below.

title: Starterkit Media
subtitle: Fast loading, responsive landing page for media production company.
detail: Media-rich website for production company with offices in Los Angeles and Kauai. Website template allows for embedding of videos from YouTube and Vimeo, as well as music from SoundCloud, BandCamp and iTunes.

title: Law Offices of Gail Dulay
subtitle: Responsive framework website with a heavy SEO focus, relying on custom-built HTML templates.
detail: Mobile-friendly, SEO-focused website for service business.

title: Tracking Live Music Venues
subtitle: Los Angeles live music venue density map.
detail: A visualization of 210 live music events taking place at 87 different venues across Los Angeles, over the course of a week. Data scraped from Ticketfly.
